enWisdom: Consultation elicits for you the correct opinions of others

Wisdom: الشِّرْكَةُ فِي الرَّأْيِ تُؤَدِّي إِلَى الصَّوَابِ
enWisdom: Participating in deliberation leads to the appropriate decision

Wisdom: امْخَضُوا الرَّأْيَ مَخْضَ السَّقَّاءِ يُنْتِجْ سَدِيدَ [شَدِيدَ] الْآرَاءِ
enWisdom: Churn the opinion [like] the churning of a water-skin, and the outcome will be the most pertinent of opinions

Wisdom: اضْرِبُوا بَعْضَ الرَّأْيِ بِبَعْضٍ يَتَوَلَّدُ مِنْهُ الصَّوَابُ
enWisdom: Compare some opinions with others, from this the right course of action will come to light

Wisdom: مَنْ لَزِمَ الْمُشَاوَرَةَ لَمْ يَعْدَمْ عِنْدَ الصَّوَابِ مَادِحاً وَعِنْدَ الْخَطَاءِ عَاذِراً
enWisdom: One who persists in consultation does not lack a praiser when the right result is achieved or an apologizer when a mistake is made
Nothing derives an appropriate outcome like consultation
Seeking advice is the essence [and source] of guidance
The essence [and source] of guidance is in consultation
The one who seeks advice is protected from failure
The one who seeks advice is on the side of success
Consultation is [a means of] ease for you and a difficulty for others

Wisdom: اسْتَشِرْ أَعْدَاءَكَ تَعْرِفْ مِنْ رَأْيِهِمْ مِقْدَارَ عَدَاوَتِهِمْ وَمَوَاضِعَ مَقَاصِدِهِمْ
enWisdom: Consult your enemies; you will know from their opinion how much enmity they have [for you] and what their objectives are
Hidden opinions are revealed through consultation

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَقْبَلَ وُجُوهَ الْآرَاءِ عَرَفَ مَوَاقِعَ الْخَطَاءِ
enWisdom: One who takes the different opinions into consideration recognizes the points of error
One who seeks advice does not go astray
